username.label: Username
username.description: Unique identifier for the user account
username.explainer: Your unique login name used to identify you in the system. This should be between 3-20 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and underscores. The username cannot be changed after account creation.

email.label: Email Address
email.explainer: Primary email address for account notifications and password recovery. Must be a valid email format and will be verified during registration.

language.label: Language
language.explainer: Preferred language for the user interface and system notifications. This setting affects date formats, number formats, and text direction.

roles.label: User Roles
roles.explainer: Defines the permissions and access levels for this user. Multiple roles can be assigned to provide granular access control.

advancedEnabled.label: Enable Advanced Settings
advancedEnabled.explainer: Enable additional configuration options for power users. These settings affect system behavior and should be modified with caution.

sessionTimeout.label: Session Timeout (minutes)
sessionTimeout.explainer: Automatically log out users after this period of inactivity. Recommended range is 15-60 minutes for security.

apiRateLimit.label: API Rate Limit
apiRateLimit.explainer: Controls the maximum number of API requests per hour. Higher limits are available for premium accounts.

emailNotifications.label: Email Notifications
emailNotifications.explainer: Receive important updates and alerts via email.

pushNotifications.label: Push Notifications
pushNotifications.explainer: Receive real-time notifications in your browser.

frequency.label: Notification Frequency
frequency.explainer: How often you want to receive notification summaries.

productName.label: Product Name
productName.explainer: The display name for your product as it appears to customers.

description.label: Product Description
description.explainer: A brief description of your product's features and benefits.

category.label: Product Category
category.explainer: Primary category for product classification and search filtering.

basePrice.label: Base Price ($)
basePrice.explainer: The standard retail price for this product before any discounts.

discountEnabled.label: Enable Discounts
discountEnabled.explainer: Allow promotional discounts and special pricing for this product.

currency.label: Currency
currency.explainer: The currency used for pricing this product.

id.label: Task ID
id.explainer: Unique identifier for the warehouse task. This UUID is automatically generated and cannot be changed once created.

whId.label: Warehouse ID
whId.explainer: Numeric identifier for the warehouse where this task will be executed.

taskKind.label: Task Kind
taskKind.explainer: The type of warehouse task to be performed. This determines the workflow and validation rules.

taskSubKind.label: Task Sub-Kind
taskSubKind.explainer: Optional sub-classification for more specific task categorization.

sequence.label: Sequence
sequence.explainer: Execution order priority. Lower numbers execute first.

taskLabel.label: Task Label
taskLabel.explainer: Human-readable label for the task. Use '-' for default.

tripType.label: Trip Type
tripType.explainer: Optional trip type classification for logistics planning.

groupBy.label: Group By
groupBy.explainer: Array of fields to group tasks by for batch processing.

huKinds.label: HU Kinds
huKinds.explainer: Array of handling unit types that this task can process.

taskAttrs.label: Task Attributes

destAreaType.label: Destination Area Type
destAreaType.explainer: Type of area where items will be placed.

destZoneFace.label: Destination Zone Face
destZoneFace.explainer: Specific zone face for item placement.

taskAttrs.explainer: Configuration attributes that define task destination parameters.

storageIdentifiers.label: Storage Identifiers

uom.label: UOM
uom.explainer: Unit of measure for storage calculations.

storageIdentifiers.explainer: Identifiers used for storage location and capacity management.

lineIdentifiers.label: Line Identifiers
lineIdentifiers.explainer: Additional line-level identifiers for task tracking.

strat.label: Strategy
strat.explainer: Main strategy identifier for task execution logic.

sortingStrategy.label: Sorting Strategy
sortingStrategy.explainer: Strategy for sorting items during task execution.

loadingStrategy.label: Loading Strategy
loadingStrategy.explainer: Strategy for loading items onto handling units.

mapSegregationGroupsToBins.label: Map Segregation Groups to Bins
mapSegregationGroupsToBins.explainer: Whether to automatically map segregation groups to specific bins.

dropHUInBin.label: Drop HU in Bin
dropHUInBin.explainer: Allow dropping handling units directly into bins.

scanDestHUInDrop.label: Scan Destination HU in Drop
scanDestHUInDrop.explainer: Require scanning destination handling unit during drop operations.

allowHUBreakInDrop.label: Allow HU Break in Drop
allowHUBreakInDrop.explainer: Allow breaking handling units during drop operations.

strictBatchAdherence.label: Strict Batch Adherence
strictBatchAdherence.explainer: Enforce strict adherence to batch requirements during task execution.

allowWorkOrderSplit.label: Allow Work Order Split
allowWorkOrderSplit.explainer: Allow splitting work orders across multiple tasks or workers.

undoOp.label: Undo Operation
undoOp.explainer: Enable undo functionality for task operations.

disableWorkOrder.label: Disable Work Order
disableWorkOrder.explainer: Disable work order creation for this task type.

supportPalletScan.label: Support Pallet Scan
supportPalletScan.explainer: Enable pallet scanning functionality for this task.

pickMandatoryScan.label: Pick Mandatory Scan
pickMandatoryScan.explainer: Require mandatory scanning during pick operations.

dropMandatoryScan.label: Drop Mandatory Scan
dropMandatoryScan.explainer: Require mandatory scanning during drop operations.

params.label: Parameters
params.explainer: Advanced parameters for fine-tuning task behavior.

enableManualDestBinSelection.label: Enable Manual Destination Bin Selection
enableManualDestBinSelection.explainer: Allow manual selection of destination bins instead of automatic assignment.

mobileSorting.label: Mobile Sorting
mobileSorting.explainer: Enable sorting functionality on mobile devices.
